params.amount0Min: The minimum amount of token0 that should be accounted for the burned liquidity,
params.amount1Min: The minimum amount of token1 that should be accounted for the burned liquidity,
params.deadline: The time by which the transaction must be included to effect the change
params.liquidity: The amount of liquidity to be unstaked from the gauge

returns.amount0: The amount of token0 decreased from position
returns.amount1: The amount of token1 decreased from position

earned(address,uint256).details: Throws if account is not the position ownerpool.updateRewardsGrowthGlobal() needs to be called first, to return the correct claimable rewards

getReward(address).details: Throws if not called by the voter

getReward(uint256).details: Throws if not called by the position owner

params.amount0Desired: The desired amount of token0 to be staked,
params.amount0Min: The minimum amount of token0 to spend, which serves as a slippage check,
params.amount1Desired: The desired amount of token1 to be staked,
params.amount1Min: The minimum amount of token1 to spend, which serves as a slippage check,
params.deadline: The time by which the transaction must be included to effect the change

returns.amount0: The amount of token0 required to obtain new liquidity amount
returns.amount1: The amount of token1 required to obtain new liquidity amount
returns.liquidity: The new liquidity amount as a result of the increase

params._feesVotingReward: The address of the feesVotingReward contract
params._isPool: Whether the attached pool is a real pool or not
params._nft: The address of the nft position manager contract
params._rewardToken: The address of the reward token
params._tickSpacing: The tick spacing of the pool
params._token0: The address of token0 of the pool
params._token1: The address of token1 of the pool
params._voter: The address of the voter contract

params.amount: Amount of gauge rewards (emissions) to notify. Must be greater than 604_800.

notifyRewardWithoutClaim(uint256).details: Notifies gauge of gauge rewards without distributing its fees.      Assumes gauge reward tokens is 18 decimals.      If not 18 decimals, rewardRate may have rounding issues.

params.amount: Amount of gauge rewards (emissions) to notify. Must be greater than 604_800.

params.index: The index of the staked tokenId

returns._0: The tokenId of the staked position
Whether the position is staked in the gauge
The amount of positions staked in the gauge
The tokenIds of the staked positions

decreaseStakedLiquidity(uint256,uint128,.notice: Used to decrease liquidity of a staked position

deposit(uint256).notice: Used to deposit a CL position into the gaugeAllows the user to receive emissions instead of fees

earned(address,uint256).notice: Returns the claimable rewards for a given account and tokenId

fees0().notice: Cached amount of fees generated from the Pool linked to the Gauge of token0

fees1().notice: Cached amount of fees generated from the Pool linked to the Gauge of token1

feesVotingReward().notice: Address of the FeesVotingReward contract linked to the gauge

gaugeFactory().notice: Address of the factory that created this gauge

getReward(address).notice: Retrieve rewards for all tokens owned by an account

increaseStakedLiquidity(uint256,uint256,.notice: Used to increase liquidity of a staked position

initialize(address,address,address,addre.notice: Called on gauge creation by CLGaugeFactory

isPool().notice: To provide compatibility support with the old voter

lastUpdateTime(uint256).notice: Most recent timestamp tokenId called updateRewards

left().notice: Total amount of rewardToken to distribute for the current rewards period

nft().notice: NonfungiblePositionManager used to create nfts this gauge accepts

periodFinish().notice: Timestamp end of current rewards period

pool().notice: Address of the CL pool linked to the gauge

rewardGrowthInside(uint256).notice: Returns the rewardGrowthInside of the position at the last user action (deposit, withdraw, getReward)

rewardRate().notice: Current reward rate of rewardToken to distribute per second

rewardRateByEpoch(uint256).notice: View to see the rewardRate given the timestamp of the start of the epoch

stakedByIndex(address,uint256).notice: Fetch a staked tokenId by index

stakedContains(address,uint256).notice: Check whether a position is staked in the gauge by a certain user

stakedLength(address).notice: The amount of positions staked in the gauge by a certain user

stakedValues(address).notice: Fetch all tokenIds staked by a given account

tickSpacing().notice: Cached tick spacing of the pool.

token0().notice: Cached address of token0, corresponding to token0 of the pool

token1().notice: Cached address of token1, corresponding to token1 of the pool

voter().notice: Voter contract gauge receives emissions from

withdraw(uint256).notice: Used to withdraw a CL position from the gaugeAllows the user to receive fees instead of emissionsOutstanding emissions will be collected on withdrawal
